description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the KUKA KR 90 configured to the floor plan at Urban Art Projects (UAP), Northgate, Brisbane (Australia).

This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for KUKA KR 90 manipulators, 3D printing extruder head, and room artefacts. This currently includes the R2700 PRO (KR QUANTEC PRO) only.

Joint limits and maximum joint velocities are based on the information found in the online https://www.kuka.com/-/media/kuka-downloads/imported/48ec812b1b2947898ac2598aff70abc0/spez_kr_quantec_pro_en.pdf. All urdfs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits, unless noted otherwise.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use.
